original_title: Sri Lanka to set up financial sector crisis committee
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s cabinet has cleared the setting up of a committee to avoid a crisis in the financial sector and minimize the fallout from the economic crisis, Minister Bandula Gunawardana said.
There was a requirement to take timely decisions to manage the current economic crisis.
A committee will be set up to co-ordinate the actions and readiness of the central bank and finance ministry ion relation to managing any banking crisis.
A technical committee made up of experts to manage any crisis in the banking system, will also be formed, Minister Gunawardana said.
Changes are also planned to a Banking (Special Provisions) Act. (Colombo/Mar08/2023)
